name: reinvention
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of producing something new based on something that aleady exists, or the new thing that is produced: Her peach crème brûlée was an inspiring piece of reinvention. Fairy tales are templates whose re-inventions tell us about ourselves.
the act of changing your job or the way you look and behave so that you seem very different : The former singer's reinvention as a fashion designer has been a great success. Few celebrities have undergone as many re-inventions as Kylie.
More examplesFewer examplesA complete re-invention of the firm’s business model may be required.What happened after his reinvention as family entertainer?Not all of his reinventions have been a success.
